oai_dc:dc.dc:title: IBM 1620 Computer and Numerical Analysis Workshop
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: De La Salle Christian Brothers; Religious communities
oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
Brothers from throughout the Midwest came to CBC for a multi-day training session on the capabilities of the IBM 1620.
Front row: Brother Daniel Hansen, Brother Kilian Bernardine, Brother Christopher, Brother Dan Weems, Brother Raymond, Brother Ambrose
Back row: Brother Lawrence Justin, Brother Liguori John, Brother Luperious Arnold, Mel Woolsey, Brother Louis Horace Althaus, Jerry Bradshaw, Brother Jeffery Francis, Brother Liguori Gabriel, Brother Herman John, Brother Joseph Paschal
